diagnostic_reasoning: Skin biopsy revealed yeast forms consistent with Blastomyces dermatitidis.
Fungal cultures from bronchoscopy and skin specimens also grew Blastomyces dermatitidis.
Initial misdiagnosis of cryptococcosis was ruled out after observing the specific characteristics of B dermatitidis in tissue with GMS staining.
Improvement of lung and skin lesions after initiating treatment with itraconazole further supported the diagnosis.
